title: Apex Predators? Team Soudal Becomes ‘T-Rex Quick-Step’ For Vuelta a España
content:
'Landismosaurus Rex' leads Quick-Step into Vuelta with momentum from Tour de France top-5 and good vibes from new jersey: 'It's a really cool design.'

Read the full article at Apex Predators? Team Soudal Becomes ‘T-Rex Quick-Step’ For Vuelta a España on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
